title: Embed user-uploaded thumb-up.svg and thumb-down.svg into inline React icon components

requirements.text: Replace the current placeholder/generated SVG markup inside `frontend/src/components/icons/ThumbsUpIcon.tsx` with the exact SVG markup from the user-uploaded file `thumb-up.svg`, preserving the component’s `className` support and ensuring the rendered icon matches the uploaded design.
acceptanceCriteria: `ThumbsUpIcon` renders the same shape/design as `thumb-up.svg` (not the current placeholder strokes).
`ThumbsUpIcon` still accepts `className` and applies it to the root `<svg>` element (or equivalent wrapper) so sizing/color can be controlled by existing Tailwind classes.

requirements.text: Replace the current placeholder/generated SVG markup inside `frontend/src/components/icons/ThumbsDownIcon.tsx` with the exact SVG markup from the user-uploaded file `thumb-down.svg`, preserving the component’s `className` support and ensuring the rendered icon matches the uploaded design.
acceptanceCriteria: `ThumbsDownIcon` renders the same shape/design as `thumb-down.svg` (not the current placeholder strokes).
`ThumbsDownIcon` still accepts `className` and applies it to the root `<svg>` element (or equivalent wrapper) so sizing/color can be controlled by existing Tailwind classes.

requirements.text: Ensure the app uses these updated inline SVG components everywhere thumbs appear on the Today screen and History/Journal UI (no fallback to any older/generated thumb SVGs or image paths).
acceptanceCriteria: Today screen thumb UI renders using `ThumbsUpIcon`/`ThumbsDownIcon` and visually matches the uploaded SVG designs.
History/Journal thumb outcome icons render using `ThumbsUpIcon`/`ThumbsDownIcon` and visually match the uploaded SVG designs.

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing shadcn components instead).
Do not edit files in `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, or `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
nonGoals: Do not change onboarding slide images or their asset paths.
Do not introduce new PNG thumb assets or switch thumbs back to runtime-loaded `` assets.
